title: ACOTAR Relationships
description: Test your knowledge of the romances and bonds!

questions.question: Who does Feyre end up marrying?
questions.explanation: Feyre and Rhysand are mates and get married, becoming the High Lord and High Lady of the Night Court.

questions.question: Feyre is the first High Lady in Prythian's history.
questions.explanation: Rhysand makes Feyre his equal, naming her High Lady of the Night Courtâ€”a first in history.

questions.question: Who is Nesta's love interest?
questions.explanation: Nesta and Cassian have a enemies-to-lovers romance that is central to A Court of Silver Flames.

questions.question: Who is Elain's mate?
questions.explanation: Lucien discovered he was Elain's mate when she emerged from the Cauldron, though she initially rejected the bond.

questions.question: Mor has romantic feelings for Azriel.
questions.explanation: Mor is actually attracted to women and has hidden this, though Azriel has feelings for her.

questions.question: Why did Feyre's relationship with Tamlin fall apart?

options.text: She fell for someone else immediately
His controlling behavior and trapping her
She wanted to be human again

questions.explanation: Tamlin became controlling and overprotective, refusing to let Feyre have freedom or heal from her trauma.

questions.question: What is the romantic trope between Nesta and Cassian?
questions.explanation: Nesta and Cassian start with intense hostility before their relationship develops into love.

questions.question: What did Rhysand do Under the Mountain to protect Feyre?

options.text: Made a bargain and shielded her mind

questions.explanation: Rhysand made a bargain with Feyre and secretly protected her mind from Amarantha's torture.
